name: @compliance-theater/redis
description: Redis client utilities for the Title IX Victim Advocacy Platform

scripts.build:typescript: echo 'Building lib/redis typescript...' && tsc -b tsconfig.json && printf '\u001b[1;32mBuild complete: @compliance-theater/redis.\u001b[0m\n' || (printf '\u001b[31mBuild failed: @compliance-theater/redis.\u001b[0m\n' >&2; exit 1)
scripts.build:publish: yarn workspace @compliance-theater/redis run build:clean && yarn workspace @compliance-theater/redis run build && yarn workspace @compliance-theater/redis pack --out ./dist/@compliance-theater-redis.tgz
